traits.Brave: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
traits.Dwarven Resilience: The knight of the mithral shield has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.
traits.Possessed: While the knight is possessed by yakfolk, its alignment is lawful evil and it can speak Yikaria (the yakfolk tongue).

actions.Multiattack: The knight makes two melee attacks.
actions.Warhammer: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
actions.Heavy Crossbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2+1d4 + 0 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.
actions.Leadership (Recharges after a Short or L: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.
